languages.text: Благодаря мудрому наставлению Вольного Торговца их атакам удалось пробить броню Крика скверны. Жестокие и унизительные раны были нанесены нечестивому палачу, и был он обращен в позорное бегство.
It was the Rogue Trader's wise guidance that allowed their strikes to pierce Doomscream's armour. Brutally wounded and humiliated, the profane executioner had no choice but to flee from the fight.
languages.original_text: Благодаря мудрому наставлению Вольного Торговца их атакам удалось пробить броню Крика скверны. Жестокие и унизительные раны были нанесены нечестивому палачу, и был он обращен в позорное бегство.

traits.locale_text: It was the Rogue Trader's wise guidance that allowed their strikes to pierce Balescream's armour. Brutally wounded and humiliated, the profane executioner had no choice but to flee from the fight.

It was the Rogue Trader's wise guidance that allowed their strikes to pierce Doomscream's armour. Brutally wounded and humiliated, the profane executioner had no choice but to flee from the fight.

languages.text: 在行商浪人英明的指引之下，两人的攻击刺穿了灾啸的护甲。这位亵渎神明的刽子手受了重伤，别无选择，只能耻辱地逃离战场。
languages.original_text: It was the Rogue Trader's wise guidance that allowed their strikes to pierce Doomscream's armour. Brutally wounded and humiliated, the profane executioner had no choice but to flee from the fight.

traits.locale_text: 在行商浪人英明的指引之下，两人的攻击刺穿了灾啸的护甲。这位亵渎神明的刽子手受了重伤，别无选择，只能耻辱地逃离战场。

languages.text: Grâce aux conseils avisés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, leurs frappes ont fini par percer l'armure du Fléau Hurlant. Violemment blessé et humilié, le bourreau impie n'a pas eu d'autre choix que de fuir le combat.
languages.original_text: It was the Rogue Trader's wise guidance that allowed their strikes to pierce Doomscream's armour. Brutally wounded and humiliated, the profane executioner had no choice but to flee from the fight.

traits.locale_text: Grâce aux conseils avisés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, leurs frappes ont fini par percer l'armure du Fléau Hurlant. Violemment blessé et humilié, le bourreau impie n'a pas eu d'autre choix que de fuir le combat.

languages.text: 自由開拓者の賢明な導きにより、彼らの攻撃はドゥームスクリームの装甲を突破した。残忍な傷を負い、屈辱を味わった冒涜的な処刑人は、戦いから逃げるしかなかった。
languages.original_text: It was the Rogue Trader's wise guidance that allowed their strikes to pierce Doomscream's armour. Brutally wounded and humiliated, the profane executioner had no choice but to flee from the fight.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者の賢明な導きにより、彼らの攻撃はベイルスクリームの装甲を突破した。残忍な傷を負い、屈辱を味わった冒涜的な処刑人は、戦いから逃げるしかなかった。

languages.text: Fue la sabia guía de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente la que permitió que sus ataques atravesaran la armadura de Doomscream. Brutalmente herido y humillado, el impío verdugo no tuvo más opciones que huir de la batalla.
languages.original_text: It was the Rogue Trader's wise guidance that allowed their strikes to pierce Doomscream's armour. Brutally wounded and humiliated, the profane executioner had no choice but to flee from the fight.

traits.locale_text: Fue la sabia guía de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente la que permitió que sus ataques atravesaran la armadura de Balescream. Brutalmente herido y humillado, el impío verdugo no tuvo más opciones que huir de la batalla.

languages.text: Es war die weise Führung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, die es ihren Hieben erlaubte, Unheilsschreis Rüstung zu durchbohren. Brutal verwundet und gedemütigt hatte der profane Henker keine andere Wahl, als aus dem Kampf zu fliehen.
languages.original_text: It was the Rogue Trader's wise guidance that allowed their strikes to pierce Doomscream's armour. Brutally wounded and humiliated, the profane executioner had no choice but to flee from the fight.

traits.locale_text: Es war die weise Führung {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, die es ihren Hieben erlaubte, Unheilsschreis Rüstung zu durchbohren. Brutal verwundet und gedemütigt hatte der profane Henker keine andere Wahl, als aus dem Kampf zu fliehen.
